906780.name: Fantasy Grounds - Odds and Ends, Volume 6 (Token Pack)
906780.description:
Odds and Ends, Volume 6

With Monster Grin's Odds & Ends token packs, it might sometimes be random, but it's always gonna be awesome! Take these 120 unique, artfully designed and stunning tokens by artist Emanuele "Rooster Ema" Galletto for instance: stylistic fantasy excellence! If you're looking to add some commoners to your game or to your party, be sure and pick up these tokens, which include archivists, ronins, inkeepers, drunkards, and much more!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Male Human Drunkard
  • Female Human Archivist
  • Male Human Leper
  • Male Human Ronin
  • Female Human Innkeeper
  • Female Human Courtesan
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
